actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: To amend the Small Business Act to require the establishment of a regional or branch office of the Small Business Administration in each State.
short_title: Small Business Administration Equal Representation Act

summary.text: Small Business Administration Equal Representation Act - Amends the Small Business Act to require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration (SBA) to establish at least one SBA district office in each State.

titles.title: Small Business Administration Equal Representation Act
To amend the Small Business Act to require the establishment of a regional or branch office of the Small Business Administration in each State.
